name: gurgle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of babies) to make a happy sound with the back of the throat: The baby lay gurgling in her cot.
(of water, especially small streams) to flow quickly while making a low, pleasant sound: Outside of her window the stream gurgled over the rocks.
